document.full_text: world trade will grow by 6.5 percent this year, the world trade organization said on thursday, above the average rate between 1990 and 2008 of 6 percent, but falling short of last year's dramatic rebound.
document.title: world trade to grow 6.5 percent by volume in 2011: wto
lines_and_colors: world trade will grow by 6.5 percent this year, the world trade organization said on thursday, above the average rate between 1990 and 2008 of 6 percent, but falling short of last year's dramatic rebound.
